Recent Cultural Achievements

Our students have excelled in various cultural competitions and events at district, state, and national levels.

2023-24

State Level Folk Dance Competition - First Prize

Our school's folk dance team won the first prize at the State Level Cultural Festival with their mesmerizing performance of traditional Karnataka folk dance forms.

Award-Winning Performance
2023-24

Interschool Music Competition - Vocal & Instrumental

Our students secured top positions in both vocal and instrumental categories at the Interschool Music Competition, showcasing their exceptional talent and dedication.

Award-Winning Performance
2023-24

District Level Drama Competition - Best Performance

The school drama team received the 'Best Performance' award at the District Level Drama Competition for their thought-provoking play on social issues.

Award-Winning Performance
2023-24

National Level Art Exhibition - Special Recognition

Five students from our school received special recognition at the National Level Art Exhibition for their creative and innovative artwork representing rural Karnataka.

Award-Winning Performance

Cultural Activities

We offer a wide range of cultural activities to nurture artistic talents and preserve cultural heritage.

Classical Dance

Training in Bharatanatyam, Kathak, and other classical dance forms

Folk Dance

Traditional Karnataka folk dance forms including Dollu Kunitha and Yakshagana

Music

Vocal and instrumental music training in both classical and contemporary styles

Drama & Theatre

Theatre arts, script writing, and performance techniques

Visual Arts

Drawing, painting, sculpture, and other visual art forms

Literary Arts

Creative writing, poetry, debate, and public speaking

Handicrafts

Traditional crafts and artisanal skills

Cultural Festivals

Celebration of various cultural and traditional festivals

Annual Cultural Festival

Our school hosts an annual cultural festival 'Kala Utsav' that showcases the diverse talents of our students. The three-day event features performances in dance, music, drama, and various other art forms.

The festival also includes art exhibitions, literary competitions, and cultural workshops conducted by renowned artists and experts. It provides a platform for students to express their creativity and gain exposure to various art forms.

Upcoming Festival

Dates: December 10-12, 2024

Theme: "Unity in Diversity: Celebrating India's Cultural Heritage"

Chief Guest: Renowned Classical Dancer (To be announced)

Cultural Gallery

Moments captured from various cultural events and performances.
